title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 85.3 - Definitions pertaining to this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 85.3 - Definitions pertaining to this part

State Regulations

Outpatient facility or nonresidential facility shall mean
any clinic, center, institute, hospital, school, institution or other place
providing a program of services for the mentally disabled on other than a
24-hour basis and not including overnight stay by those
served. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
85.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
